data.name: 蛊婆- Secret Mission秘密任务
data.detailed_description:
Why did Miao Mo, a researcher, appear in the ancient tomb? What terrible experience did she experience before she met Gu Jiuxun? Fighting and escaping are the only things you need to consider at the moment!



On the southwest border, under the altar of the ancient village, there were bursts of creepy sounds. Miao Mo, a mysterious female researcher, walked alone through the huge Han Dynasty ancient tomb under the altar. The roads in the tomb were complex and monsters were rampant.



Today is the day when a special ceremony is held in the stockade. Why did she suddenly appear in the ancient tomb and in front of Gu Jiuxun?
There seems to be too many questions hidden behind her, but now she has no second to delay. She has to complete her secret mission at all costs!



Can she achieve her goal?
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: In this DLC, you will control Miao Mo, a female researcher, to complete her secret mission.This DLC will complement the pre plot of "what did Miao Mo experience before Gu Jiuxun entered the ancient tomb"
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD FX™-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700/ AMD Ryzen 2500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/ AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
